features: GO BLONDER - Lighten and tone to maintain natural subtle tones and beautiful highlights
FROM THE BLONDE EXPERTS - This salon quality shampoo is paraben free, phthalate free, ammonia free and silicone free.
SAFE FOR COLOR-TREATED HAIR - John Frieda Go Blonder Shampoo is an ultimate blonde tone enhancer for color treated and natural hair, highlights and low lights.
CRUELTY FREE & VEGAN-FRIENDLY - This shampoo for blonde color-treated hair you can feel good about.
MADE WITH 50% RECYCLED MATERIAL - As part of the John Frieda Team’s commitment to making products that are ethically and sustainably responsible.
body.description: This shampoo for blonde hair is an expertly formulated blonde tone enhancer that gently lightens and boosts shine while cleansing. Infused with a citrus botanical blend, this formula nourishes and moisturizes to promote soft, smooth, healthy hair. Gently cleanse and lighten for bright, natural-looking blonde. This expertly formulated shampoo for blonde hair is the ultimate blonde tone enhancer, that gently lightens and boosts shine while cleansing. Infused with a citrus botanical blend this formula lightens and tones your hair while moisturizing and nourishing to promote soft, smooth, healthy hair when used with John Frieda's Go Blonder Conditioner. Use the John Frieda Go Blonder Shampoo and Conditioner and Go Blonder Lightening Spray for optimal, natural-looking lightening. Paraben Free, Phthalate Free, Silicone Free, Ammonia Free, Cruelty Free, Vegan Friendly hair lightening shampoo. John Frieda Go Blonder Shampoo enhances your blonde hair for bright, natural-looking blonde. The John Frieda Go Blonder Shampoo is safe for use on natural, color treated blonde, highlights and lowlights. Not recommended for white, platinum, or cooler blonde tones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My hair is brownish blonde and I occasionally get highlights... at least I used to. Since I started using this product, I haven't had any highlights for over a year now. I blow dry my hair. This shampoo keeps my hair looking natural summer blonde. I love this product! It has a pleasant smell and it works great for me. I recommend giving it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives you a natural looking blonde color.
reviews.reviewText: I used a darker color on my hair a few weeks ago by mistake. It came out looking very dark blonde and my natural is a medium blonde. Rather than risk ruining my hair by coloring it again so soon, I decided to try this shampoo instead. It had great reviews and is very reasonably priced. It lightened my hair quite a bit so that it looks more like my own color. My hair feels and looks soft and shiny, instead of dried out as I feared it would. This shampoo is amazing! My hair looks and feels great, and a few more shampoos should have me right back to what I wanted. I've never used this product before, but I intend to use it every third shampoo from now on. I don't want it to get too light and by alternating it with my other shampoo it should keep looking and feeling soft and natural. If I could give it 10 stars I would! I'm a definite fan of this product.Linneaann

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes already blonde hair lighter
reviews.reviewText: I am always looking for this product , but I never can find anywhere . Great price . I immediately signed up for getting automatic shipped , which I set how often & when .I don't color my hair, but this keeps my blonde golden & naturally lightens , like the sun does in the Summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo lathers very well and has a nice smell. However, I did not notice anylightening of my hair at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo and it definitely keeps my blonde locks looking blonder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hair fell out
reviews.reviewText: I really really wanted to like this stuff. I used a similar blonde shampoo in the late 90s with good results. So I was hoping to go back to it to lighten my dark roots as I grew out the henna I used (no metallic salts in the one I used). Worked really well the first time. Then after the second I noticed some itching. That could've been from anything. So I continued to use it every week. It wasn't until I was down to 25% of the bottle that I realized that the the itching and slight burning I was feeling was directly after using this shampoo and conditioner, but that my hair was noticeably thinner. By my estimate I lost over 50% of my hair in 3 months after using this stuff weekly. Looking a little closer and my hair is coming out from the shaft and my scale is sensitive and dry. A big jump from always being oily after 3 days.So yes, this shampoo will lighten your hair, in both color and volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product works as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo does exactly what I wanted it to do. I will continue to buy it when needed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lightens my brassy blonde hair effortlessly!
reviews.reviewText: I don't bother spending money on expensive foils and highlights. This is literally my go to to lighten by blonde hair. I also rotate so use a regular shampoo 2 days, then this lightening shampoo 1 day, then a purple shampoo like once or twice per week etc. My hair has lightened and brightened so much and it looks 100% natural.

Due to COPD I can no longer 'colour enhance' my dark blonde hair so was steadily getting darker & greyer.I tried John Frieda Sheer Blonde Go Blonder Shampoo & got lucky - it works a treat to both lighten my hair & eliminate the greys - the bonus was no bad smells or irritation. It may be hard to find this product but well worth the search - I highly recommend it & the coordinating conditioner.
I have been using this shampoo for years love it.
